properties.name: 2 Weeks in Paris!
properties.description: Posted by Kimbanelsonparis, franceBecause my uncle had been transferred there with his family. I spent two lovely weeks (with the exception of one weekend) exploring the many sites in Paris. LOVED it. Totally need to go back. Preferably with my hubbie....

properties.name: Finding Myself....
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonSydney, AustraliaSounds lame, but totally true. I spent 4 months in North Ryde, Australia studying abroad, and worked at the famous "Abbey Bridal" owned by a relative in downtown Sydney. I would go back in an instant. I loved it there.

properties.name: Great Weekend!
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonI spent a GREAT weekend in Melbourne with two of my friends. We shopped, we explored, we went on an excursion that took us all over the place. We saw the 12 Disciples, the Great Ocean Road, rainforests, ancient trees and much more. Such culture down there.

properties.name: Honeymoon 1
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonHonolulu, HI 96825Caleb and I spent the first few days of our Honeymoon here, and really enjoyed it! We wandered, we ate, we went to the Polynesian Cultural Center, which I loved. Ah, the sunsets........

properties.name: Honeymoon 2
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonSpent the last few days of our honeymoon here, and I think secretly we loved this place the best. We had a tiny little blue compact car, and drove all over the little island. TRIED the Road to Hana, but uh, got about 3/4 of the way and had to turn around. It was dark, it was POURING, and yeah. It\'s a scary road! Drove nearly to the top of the big volcano (and coasted the entire way down to the gas station...) and just thoroughly loved it. Paradise - pure paradise.

properties.name: Lovely Weekend....
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonCannes, FranceSpent a great weekend down here, and traveled into Nice, Monte Carlo, and then we drove into Italy for lunch. That\'s right, just drove into Italy. Ate an authentic Italian lunch, and topped it off with some AMAZING gelatto. Truly amazing. Must...go...back...and spend more than 3 hours.

properties.name: My Second Home - Lake Powell
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonMy family has gone to Lake Powell every year since I was 9. I LOVE it. By far it\'s the best vacation. Most relaxing, cheapest.....ah. I love it. Everyone should go. For those not familiar with the area, it\'s like the Grand Canyon. Only filled will water. Lots and lots of water....

properties.name: National Dance Competition!
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonMy junior year of High School our dance team (called "Drill" but everyone always asks if it was an army thing. No! No! DANCE PEOPLE!!!) went to the Nationals in Florida. Craziness. So fun though.

properties.name: Oceanside, CA
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonA fairly new family tradition. Every other year we haul all 50+ people on my father\'s side of the family to Oceanside, CA, and spend a week on the beach and at the local area attractions. Six Flag! Disneyland! Um...shopping!!!

properties.name: Week of Relaxing...
properties.description: Posted by KimbanelsonIn Australia they have a two week "Spring" break. Quotations because their spring is our summer. I went by myself to a little resort right on the beach in Cairns. Relaxed, went on a tour to Kuranda, and out to the reef. Ah......The Great Barrier Reef.
